t: The Best Dark Chocolate Bars, According to Our Taste Tests
s: Made from single-origin cacao beans ... from the brand's proprietary fair-trade beans. This dark chocolate bar quickly shot to the top of our list during testing, largely thanks to its “entry-level” flavor. Nutty and slightly fruity, this chocolate felt like silk in our mouth, earning it a 4.67 out of 5 on our smoothness scale.
